Deprecated API

Contents

  • Terminally Deprecated
  • Methods
  • Terminally Deprecated Elements
    Element
    Description
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.ComponentArgumentType.component()
    use ComponentArgumentType.json() or ComponentArgumentType.miniMessage() instead.
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.FabricAudiences.asEmitter(Entity)
    for removal, we can use loom interface injection instead
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.FabricAudiences.identified(Player)
    for removal, use interface injection instead
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.FabricAudiences.toAdventure(Component)
    Use ComponentLike.asComponent() instead, implemented on Component
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.FabricAudiences.toAdventure(ResourceLocation)
    ResourceLocation directly implements key, and all Keys are ResourceLocations since Loader 0.14.0
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.PlayerLocales.locale(Player)
    Use pointer instead, player.get(Identity.LOCALE).orElse(Locale.getDefault()) on a server or client player
  • Deprecated Methods
    Method
    Description
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.ComponentArgumentType.component()
    use ComponentArgumentType.json() or ComponentArgumentType.miniMessage() instead.
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.FabricAudiences.asEmitter(Entity)
    for removal, we can use loom interface injection instead
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.FabricAudiences.identified(Player)
    for removal, use interface injection instead
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.FabricAudiences.toAdventure(Component)
    Use ComponentLike.asComponent() instead, implemented on Component
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.FabricAudiences.toAdventure(ResourceLocation)
    ResourceLocation directly implements key, and all Keys are ResourceLocations since Loader 0.14.0
    net.kyori.adventure.platform.fabric.PlayerLocales.locale(Player)
    Use pointer instead, player.get(Identity.LOCALE).orElse(Locale.getDefault()) on a server or client player
